ygData.subject: RE: Werewolf Claw
ygData.msgSnippet: Kaladiel, Well last night was pretty good.   Over the course of the day, we hunted kobolds till the king room opened up for us to hunt.   We finally got in it,
ygData.messageBody:
Kaladiel,

Well last night was pretty good. Over the course of the day, we hunted
kobolds till the king room opened up for us to hunt. We finally got in it,
broke the spawn, and had a merry old time (and I got a Large Soiled Bag!
woo woo!).

However, at the end of the night, me and the mage (Raraielie) went linkdead
at the same time. We came back on to find the party gone and one member's
corpse (Jagriel) on the ground. We zone out with kobolds in tow, no
problem.

While going on corpse retrieval, we get into the hall leading to the king
room, are fighting two kobolds when *bam* the mage and I go linkdead again!
This time me and her log back on to our bind points. = (

She zones in, finds her corpse and re-joins the party. However, no one in
the zone sees my corpse anywhere. No corpse, no res. So I hoof it back
from Freeport and did I mention Nektulos and East Commons are REALLY dark at
night? Anyway I eventually make it back to the team, and I zone into
Solusek B (It's about 2:15am).

I start running around jamming my /corpse hotkey. Corpse IS in zone (yay!)
but never in range of my summon (boo!). I explore as far as I can without
bringing kobolds down on the house, but no dice. I sit down, file a
petition, and prepare to wait a few minutes.

<SYSTEMWIDE MESSAGE: THE SERVERS ARE COMING DOWN NOW! LOGOUT NOW!>

Uh oh.

Anyway, I log into the chat room, and there are a couple guides and GM's
there who, while trying to be helpful, have no idea what the nature of the
problem is (per usual, can't the techs give the GM's SOME idea of what's
going on? = P). After about a half hour of the inane banter in the chat
room, I call it a night and go to sleep.

Overall? Before death I got 2 and half bubbles (so I netted 2 and a
quarter) of 45 xp, the nice bag, and some undisclosed amount of platinum.
The extremely low turnover rate for our group was nice (4 of the 6 people in
the group were there from start to end - about 2pm to 2am).

We got kinda loopy at points, I was trying to decipher the cave paintings in
the rooms, and I explored an underlava tunnel from the King room lava pool.
At 83 fire resist, I was taking 23 or 27 points per hit from the lava.
The tunnel goes a way, comes up to a small "way station" type room (Small
room, no exits except through the lava tunnels), and then continues on (I
opted not to explore beyond that = P).

I think that things were just going too well for us and the game just had to
throw a wrench in it. = )

So, hopefully tonight I can log on, get my corpse, get a GM ress *crosses
fingers*, and continue on my merry way. Not much time for EQ tonight, but
I'll be on an hour or two.

Fare well

Larn, Brell Serilis

>From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'" <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Werewolf Claw
>Date: Wed, 8 Dec 1999 09:02:13 -0800
>
>What are you following me around Larn. =) I never did find a stupid group,
>so I had our 34th level Shaman buff my Ranger and slaughtered Goblins in
>the
>goblin camps in Butcher Block. That was pretty fun. Your gonna be on
>tonight
>right, I want in on some of that doggy whuppin!!!
>
>Kaladiel
>38th level
>Brell Serilis
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Scott Hueseman [mailto:shueseman@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 8:45 AM
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Werewolf Claw
>
>
>From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
>Hiya, Kaladiel!
>
>There seems to be a misconception about mistmoore werewolves. To my
>understanding, they do NOT drop the claw for the Karg quest. They drop the
>Talon for the crafted breastplate quest. I believe you can only get a
>claw
>
>from werewolves in outdoor areas. Someone please, please correct me if I
>am wrong, but I believe this to be true.
>
>Fare well
>
>Larn, Brell Serilis
>
>
> >From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com

> >Hi all, I have decided that it is time for me to complete something I
>have
> >set out to do for quite some time. And that is to get a freaking Werewolf
> >claw. Now being one that does not like to run around in the stupid West
> >Commonlands, or West Karana asking repetitively anyone have a werewolf on
> >tracking let me know! I got so bored and tired so I have decided to go to
> >Mistmoore and try to get to the dance floor. Now I have been to MM quite
>a
> >few times but I have never been inside the castle barely even down the
>ramp
> >towards the castle. mainly the Grave Yard and the zone line. Now I would
> >like some help on any suggestions or tips as to what to go or how to go
> >about getting to the Dance Room with the Gypsies/Werewolves....i.e. party
> >make up and level or a site where there might be a map. Thanks for your
> >help.
> >
> >Kaladiel
> >39th Level Monk
> >Brell Serilis
